resources.string:
Hi, my name is Lucky. 

I am the cutest dog in the world. 
I love to eat and sleep and bark on dogs. 
I love going to long walks and play with Matan. 
I am kinda old now , but still like to play. 
I hope ill have man more fun years with my family 
Woof Woof Woof , that how i really talk 
Woof Woof Woof 
Woof Woof Woof 
Woof Woof Woof
